item.title: Thomas Roberts - Anatomy of a Crypto Scam
item.description: Thomas Roberts is a fraudulent YouTuber who uses fake crypto tutorials to spread malware. He artificially inflates his channel's popularity and promotes a malicious script that downloads harmful files and steals crypto. This scam, powered by AI-generated content, highlights the growing sophistication of online threats.
